description: A page to display denied user authorization for OIDC device flow.

optional.description: The user code for this OIDC device flow.
The form post target URL to return to the user authorize endpoint.
The ID of the registered template theme.
The HTML that contains the header of the page. This code can be modified by customizing the header.html common template.
The HTML that contains the footer of the page. This code can be modified by customizing the footer.html common template.
